title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 802.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 802.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part implements Labor Law, section 27-a, subdivision
5, which authorizes the Department of Labor to conduct inspections of premises
occupied by a public employer. The purpose of this Part is to prescribe rules
and to set forth general policies governing the right of entry for, advance
notice of, and walkaround rights on, such inspections. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
802.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
